thread.title: Deadpool's Ryan Reynolds Reveals What Kind Of Kisser Andrew Garfield Is
thread.title_full: Deadpool's Ryan Reynolds Reveals What Kind Of Kisser Andrew Garfield Is

author: Jay Jayson
title: Deadpool's Ryan Reynolds Reveals What Kind Of Kisser Andrew Garfield Is
text:
Deadpool's Ryan Reynolds Reveals What Kind Of Kisser Andrew Garfield Is Jay Jayson 0 comments 
After accepting his Man of the Year award from Harvard University's Hasty Pudding Theatricals on Friday, Deadpool star Ryan Reynolds took part in the traditional press conference that follows the annual presentation. And, as you would suspect, one of the reporters brought up his headline-grabbing smooch with former Spider-Man, Andrew Garfield , at the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards . 
So, who is the better kisser: Garfield or his wife, Blake Lively? "I'm going to go with my wife on that one, for a number of reasons," he replied (via ET ). "Make no mistake, Andrew Garfield is a wonderful kisser. Very generous. A real darting tongue." 
Several days after Garfield and Reynolds caressed each other with their lips, Stephen Colbert had Garfield appear on his late night talk show and asked him why the two stars locked lips. "I just wanted Ryan to know that I loved him, whether he won or lost," Garfield explained. " He showed up, he gave his all - it doesnâ€™t change anything in my heart."
